scripts.set-build-folder:
if test -d build
then
rm -r build
fi&& mv src/client/build .
scripts.build-client: cd src/client && yarn build && cd ../../ && yarn set-build-folder
scripts.postbuild-modules: cd functions && yarn && cd client && yarn
scripts.deploy: yarn set-env-to-prod && yarn build && yarn build-client && firebase deploy
scripts.dev: yarn set-env-to-dev && concurrently "nodemon src/index.js" "cd src/client && yarn start"
scripts.set-env-to-dev: mv src/client/src/client-env.js src/client/src/client-env-p.js && mv src/client/src/client-env-d.js src/client/src/client-env.js && mv src/server-env.js src/server-env-p.js && mv src/server-env-d.js src/server-env.js && mv src/index.js src/index-p.js && mv src/index-d.js src/index.js
scripts.set-env-to-prod: mv src/client/src/client-env.js src/client/src/client-env-d.js && mv src/client/src/client-env-p.js src/client/src/client-env.js && mv src/server-env.js src/server-env-d.js && mv src/server-env-p.js src/server-env.js && mv src/index.js src/index-d.js && mv src/index-p.js src/index.js
